Uses of Class
exceptions.NullConnectionException

  • Packages that use NullConnectionException 
    Package Description
    core  
    dao  

    • Uses of NullConnectionException in core

      Methods in core that throw NullConnectionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      getConnection is the method that gives connections to the asking method/thread
      it checks if there are any available connections - if not' it places the asking
      method/thread in a wait status.
